directions.step:
Date: Tue, 5 Mar 1996 12:12:51 -0500
From: TexGQ24@aol.com Process sour cream, Parmesan cheese, scallions and garlic in a food processor or blender until blended. Add artichokes and process just until finely chopped. Makes 1-3/4 cups.
Per 2 tablespoons: 18 cal, 1 g pro, 2 g car, 0 g fat, 1 mg chol, 26 mg sod.
FATFREE DIGEST V96 #64
From the Fatfree Vegetarian recipe list. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
